H0.text: In January 2010, who became the first mother to win the Australian Open Tennis Championships since Evonne Goolagong in the 1970's. Serena Williams

H1.text: In January 2010, who became the first mother to win the Australian Open Tennis Championships since Evonne Goolagong in the 1970's. Justine Henin

H2.text: In January 2010, who became the first mother to win the Australian Open Tennis Championships since Evonne Goolagong in the 1970's. Maria Sharapova

H3.text: In January 2010, who became the first mother to win the Australian Open Tennis Championships since Evonne Goolagong in the 1970's. Kim Kong

A4.text: On September 1, 2017, Williams gave birth to a daughter.

A5.text: She reached the final and defeated Justine Henin, who had recently come out of retirement, for her twelfth Grand Slam singles title.

A6.text: Serena Williams was able to retain her title with a win over Justine Henin, 6–4, 3–6, 6–2 in the final.
